contents:
英文维基和我问题描述中放的中文维基一样，都指出疫苗是目前人类医学界促进群体免疫产生的有效途径：Mass vaccination to induce herd immunity has since become common and proved successful in preventing the spread of many infectious diseases.
而且甚至，英文维基严厉地指出：反对疫苗（放在本次事件中则为根本没有疫苗的情况下）想要产生群体免疫是非常具有挑战性的。且疾病随时有可能返回已经免疫的社区。Opposition to vaccination has posed a challenge to herd immunity, allowing preventable diseases to persist in or return to communities that have inadequate vaccination rates.
